DOC.brief_summary: Patients presenting for elective surgery requiring orotracheal intubation will be randomized to being intubated with either the GlideScope Groove video-laryngoscope or the standard GlideScope video-laryngoscope.
DOC.brief_title: GlideScope Groove vs. Standard GlideScope: A Non-inferiority Study
DOC.detailed_description: See above. The primary outcome is time to intubation.
DOC.criteria: Any adult patient booked for elective surgery requiring orotracheal intubation. 1. Any patient with cervical spine abnormalities. 2. Any patients with known or probable difficult airways. 3. Any patient requiring rapid sequence induction.
